location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Notes and Letters on the Publication and Sale of Persia and the Persian Question

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the first folio with 1 and terminates at the last folio with 180; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. The files contains one foliation anomaly, missing folio 3.

mods.abstract: This file contains correspondence and notes concerning publication and sale of Persia and the Persian Question. The majority of the papers consist of receipts, and accounting documents by publishers who had published the initial edition of the book. The file also includes other publishers' quotes, and ideas on the republication of the book.
